metadata.title: CVE-2012-6684 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the RedCloth library 4.2.9 forRuby and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via a javascript: URI.

criterions.comment: ruby-redcloth: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
